howItWorks.title: How it works
steps: * Scan the QR from the Pack app.
* Sign the challenge with your wallet (Privy).

CheckInPanel.footnote: Every verified check-in adds HOWL and preps your wallet for future token perks.

VotingPage.title: Voting requirements
VotingPage.description: You need Self verification and HOWL Wolf level to vote. Keep your streak active.

hero.title: Moon rewards

ShowcasePage.description: Keep your repo, demo, and short docs refreshed in Notion.

success.title: Verification complete
success.body: Your identity is confirmed. Explore Wolf Den without limits.

intro.title: Verify with Self
intro.body: Scan the QR with the Self app to sync your identity with the pack.

missingConfig.title: Self verification unavailable
missingConfig.body: Set the following env vars before verifying: {vars}.
missingConfig.hint: Add them to .env.local and restart the dev server.

missingWrapper.title: Self QR unavailable
missingWrapper.body: The QR component from @selfxyz/qrcode is not available. Check the package version.

hero.label: Identity & Trust
hero.description: Secure your identity to unlock voting, check-ins, and pack perks. Scan with the Self app to confirm.

tips: • Make sure you're on a trusted network.
• If it fails, refresh the QR and try again.

intro.title: Mines
intro.description: Mind Games MVP flows. Keep the original look while we wire Self-powered logic.

appearance.title: Appearance
appearance.description: Toggle themes to match your workspace.

language.title: Language
language.description: Choose the locale for navigation and content copy.

hero.title: Wolf Den is the digital control center for the pack
hero.subtitle: Build together. Get recognized. Level up.
hero.description: Join a verified pack of builders who ship fast, earn recognition, and unlock the future HOWL economy. Mentors, quests, and rewards accelerate your next release.
hero.visionQuote: "Wolf Den acts as the digital control center for coordinating missions, mind games, and community engagement with a triptych layout that keeps the pack locked in."

metrics.label: Join the pack
metrics.title: 500+ verified builders
metrics.description: Build together, get recognized, and level up. Wolf Den is where quests, mentors, and future HOWL rewards converge.

pillars.label: Strategic Pillars
pillars.title: What powers the Den
pillars.description: Built for builders who crave momentum: verification, recognition, and shared resources keep the pack moving while future HOWL rewards await.

items.title: Verified Trust
items.description: Self verification keeps every interaction high-signal so you can build with confidence.

items.title: Gamified Progress
items.description: Quests, showcases, and voting reward contributions with HOWL streaks and future token perks.

items.title: Community Momentum
items.description: Mentors, weekly events, and collaborative spaces help the pack ship faster together.

HomeLanding.modulesDescription: A unified workspace to verify, build, and celebrate progress with the pack.

modules.title: Quests

modules.title: Check-in

modules.title: Mind Games
modules.description: Mines MVP blending strategy and stakes—earn bragging rights while gamification levels up.

modules.title: Showcase
modules.description: Spotlight demos with repo and live links so the pack can rally behind active builds.

modules.title: Voting
modules.description: Demo Day ballots gated by Self verification and HOWL tiers to reward meaningful votes.

modules.title: Mentorship
modules.description: Book mentors who have shipped before—arrive with goals, leave with unblockers.

modules.title: Stats
modules.description: Analyze HOWL, streaks, and perks as you climb the ladder toward token-enabled rewards.

modules.title: Leaderboard
modules.description: Weekly pack rankings that celebrate squads pushing the frontier forward.

items.title: Verify with Self
items.description: Quick verification brings you into the trusted network so every contribution counts.

items.title: Complete Quests
items.description: Ship projects, help others, and stack HOWL points through quests and weekly events.

items.title: Level Up
items.description: Unlock mentorship, perks, and the upcoming HOWL token economy as you climb the ranks.
